title: Dragon Age: Origins
description: From the makers of Mass Effect comes the dark fantasy epic: You are a Grey Warden, one of the last of a legendary order of guardians. With the return of mankind's ancient foe and the kingdom engulfed in civil war, you have been chosen by fate to unite the shattered lands and slay the archdemon once and for all. (1) Immerse yourself in a shattered world on the brink of annihilation; (2) Experience complex moral decisions that have game-changing consequences; (3) Sculpt your hero in your own image or fantasy; (4) Engage in bone-crushing, visceral combat against massive and terrifying creatures

childDownloads.title: Awakening Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Designed and written by the same team that brought you Dragon Age: Origins, the Awakening expansion pack offers a brand new area of the world to explore known as Amaranthine, featuring an epic story that will allow players to unravel the secrets of the darkspawn - and their true motivations! Dragon Age: Origins – Awakening provides exciting new ways for players to customize their heroes and party, including the ability to re-spec their character attributes, allowing even greater customization and replayability. Featuring an increased level cap, new spells, abilities, specializations and items, plus five all-new party members, players can continue their adventures from Dragon Age, or begin with a brand new party.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins
childDownloads.description: From the makers of Mass Effect comes the dark fantasy epic: You are a Grey Warden, one of the last of a legendary order of guardians. With the return of mankind's ancient foe and the kingdom engulfed in civil war, you have been chosen by fate to unite the shattered lands and slay the archdemon once and for all. (1) Immerse yourself in a shattered world on the brink of annihilation; (2) Experience complex moral decisions that have game-changing consequences; (3) Sculpt your hero in your own image or fantasy; (4) Engage in bone-crushing, visceral combat against massive and terrifying creatures

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening
childDownloads.description: REQUIRES LATEST TITLE UPDATE FOR DRAGON AGE: ORIGINS (installed automatically if you play while connected to Xbox LIVE). The archdemon lies dead--and yet in coastal Amaranthine, strange darkspawn still plague the land. As the newly appointed commander of the Grey Wardens, you must rebuild your shattered stronghold, recruit new Wardens to the cause, and defeat this terrifying menace. Includes: (1) A brand new campaign. (2) Five new party members -- plus the return of an old favorite. (3) Six new specializations. (4) Nearly 70 new player abilities. To begin this epic adventure: From the main menu, select New Game, then either import your character from Dragon Age: Origins or create a new, high-level hero! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Blood Dragon Armor
childDownloads.description: Commissioned by an infamous Nevarran dragon hunter, this armor was crafted in a time when dragons had almost been hunted to extinction. Infused with their blood, the armor gained notoriety after the hunter died at the hands of men rather than the dragons it was designed to protect him from.  Purchase a new copy of Dragon Age: Origins (regular or Collector’s Edition) and receive a code to download Blood Dragon Armor, a full set of armor that grants exceptional protection in combat.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - City Elf Origin Trailer
childDownloads.description: This trailer introduces the City Elf Origin.  Elves were once a free and proud race, but they were eventually enslaved by the humans and now live in poverty and fear as servants or street urchins.  Each origin offers a playable prologue that introduces your character to the world of Dragon Age: Origins.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Dalish Elf Origin Trailer
childDownloads.description: This trailer introduces the Dalish Elf Origin.  The Dalish are those elves who refuse to live in human cities, proudly wandering the most remote corners of the wild lands in small clans that rarely meet. Each origin offers a playable prologue that introduces your character to the world of Dragon Age: Origins.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Dwarf Commoner Origin Trailer
childDownloads.description: This trailer introduces the Dwarf Commoner Origin. The nobles make sure we commoners get tattooed so they can identify us. That way they know who to spit on.  Helps us, too. Makes it easier to figure out whose pockets are worth picking.  Each origin offers a playable prologue that introduces your character to the world of Dragon Age: Origins.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Dwarf Noble Origin Trailer Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: This trailer introduces the Dwarf Noble Origin.  Noble houses connive and plot to eclipse each other, often resorting to assassination and blackmail. So long as the appearance of honor is maintained, the end always justifies the means. Each origin offers a playable prologue that introduces your character to the world of Dragon Age: Origins.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Human Noble Origin Trailer
childDownloads.description: This trailer introduces the Human Noble Origin.  With the rise of the darkspawn, your noble family has sent an army to King Cailan's aid. But as you will quickly discover, the evil horde to the south is not the only darkness in Ferelden. Each origin offers a playable prologue that introduces your character to the world of Dragon Age: Origins.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Mage Origin Trailer
childDownloads.description: This trailer introduces the Mage Origin.  All apprentices must pass a final test versus temptation: the Harrowing. They are sent off to face a demon and will either summon the strength to defeat it or be possessed and perish. Each origin offers a playable prologue that introduces your character to the world of Dragon Age: Origins.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Return to Ostagar
childDownloads.description: The battle of Ostagar laid waste to your order and claimed the lives of many great men and women, including the brash King Cailan and your mentor, Duncan. Now, there are rumors that a fellow survivor of the battle has escaped from captivity and is seeking the Grey Wardens' help. The time has come to make your return to Ostagar and exact revenge upon the darkspawn. Includes: (1) A return to the battlefields of Ostagar, now thick with darkspawn encamped amidst the snow. (2) An opportunity to regain the lost arms and armor of a king. (3) A second chance to add Dog to your party. To find the survivor: (1) Play through Dragon Age: Origins until after the village of Lothering. (2) Travel to Bann Loren's Lands along the Bannorn's northwest border. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Sacred Ashes Trailer
childDownloads.description: This breathtaking trailer offers an exciting example of the bone-crushing visceral combat experienced in the dark brutal fantasy Dragon Age: Origins.  In order to defeat the Darkspawn invasion, one must utilize the strengths of each party member and fight as a team against each adversary. If this is done properly, one can slay even ageless dragons.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - The Stone Prisoner
childDownloads.description: Some versions of Dragon Age: Origins contain a redemption code to obtain this content for free. Check your game's packaging before purchasing. Crafted by the ancient dwarves as their first line of defense against the darkspawn, the dread sentinels known as golems dwindled in number after the art of their creation was lost. Shale, one of the few golems remaining, was found in the Deep Roads, reactivated and brought to the surface, and may prove to be the Grey Wardens' most effective weapon against the onslaught of the Blight. Includes: (1) Shale, a unique and powerful golem, as a recruitable party member who is fully integrated into the main Dragon Age: Origins campaign. (2) Brand new plots and adventure areas. (3) Fantastic new items. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - The Stone Prisoner
childDownloads.description: Enter battle with one of the most powerful party members in the game on your side. The Stone Prisoner downloadable content includes Shale, a hulking stone golem with a unique play-style and devastating new abilities, plus all-new quests, items, and more.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Warden's Keep
childDownloads.description: Two centuries ago, the Grey Wardens were expelled from Ferelden amidst a storm of blood and betrayal. Their fortress remains at remote Soldier's Peak, overgrown and reportedly haunted. Now comes a chance to unearth this lost chapter of Grey Warden history, to unravel the mystery behind its fall, and finally reclaim it for the order! To begin the journey to Soldier's Peak, return to your party camp from the world map and seek out a merchant named Levi Dryden. Includes: (1) A fun dungeon-delving adventure; (2) A set of ancient Grey Warden armor, complete with heraldry; (3) A chance to gain two of six mysterious new abilities. (4) A new base complete with merchants and a party chest to store your hard-earned loot. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Warden's Keep Trailer
childDownloads.description: Discover what happened to the Grey Wardens order at their darkest hour and uncover secrets hidden for generations in this brand-new downloadable content. Available for purchase, this new content will lead you on a harrowing adventure with all-new achievements, unlockable character abilities, powerful items, and much more!

childDownloads.title: Dragon Age Origins Tee
childDownloads.description: Get this accessory from the Dragon Age: Origins collection! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
